name: Monster Parade: Nurturing a Hero’s Sacred Sword!?
name_original: Monster Parade: Nurturing a Hero’s Sacred Sword!?
description:
As they say, "It's not good to hold it in."
But who would have thought that mingling with gorgeous monster girls would power you up!?


STORY

In a world known as Ecstasia,
humans and demonoids occupied their own respective realms
and lived alongside in peace.

At some time,
Lelou—a demonoid of the Succubus species—
was born possessing great strength and an evil nature.
She robs the throne and institutes a reign of terror,
setting forth an era of gloom.

There was, however, one being
that was determined to bring her down.
Her name is Shuri—daughter of the former monarch.

When Shuri learns of a "hero" being summoned to the human kingdom,
she builds hopes on him being able to subdue the Demon Monarch.

This "hero" possesses tremendous powers that could only be brought out through sexual intercourse;
thus, the dungeons leading up to the Monarch's palace turn into a "breeding ground" for nurturing the hero's "sacred sword."

Shuri discreetly guides the hero through the dungeons, assisting him to defeat the monster girls dwelling within.
After subduing them, the hero unleashes his sexual desires upon them, making him stronger with every screwing session.


FEATURES

Your objective is to renovate the dungeons to guide the hero, who moves automatically.
You can install and destroy walls to shield the hero or lead him to confront enemies;
install treasure chests to strengthen him in battle; or even command him to retreat when in a crunch.
Shuri will acquire mana by clearing each dungeon; allowing her to unlock additional skills to assist the hero.

This game will provide you with quick comfort after clearing every dungeon, but don't let your guard down!
The Demon Monarch will not go down that easily!
Happy mingling!
